Blurb: This release contains changes to eventually allow deploying to a webpage.
This is the first version of the application to deploy in WASM and be accessible externally. Stan and I will rapidly iterate from here.
This version includes bug fixes, a new changelog viewer in the Help mode, and tweaks to the Welcome screen.
This version includes an initial implementation of Pep/9.
This version includes improved debugging features and improved tab management.
This version focuses on improving the new user experience for Pep/9, and was the first version demo'ed to current students.
This version focuses on fixing issues discovered during the student demos.
This version is focused on improving the Pep/10 assembler to support the dynamic stack trace.
